DOC.brief_summary: To further evaluate the long term clinical safety and effectiveness of the Trifecta valve in subjects who had a Trifecta valve implanted during the IDE study.
DOC.brief_title: Post-Approval Study Protocol of the St. Jude Medical Trifecta Valve
DOC.criteria: Subjects implanted with a Trifecta valve at one of the US sites of the IDE study. Subject met eligibility criteria of IDE study Subject agrees to complete study followup visits Subject provides written informed consent Subject currently participating in another device or drug study Subject unable or unwilling to return for study followup visits
